doc.field: "A Chorographical Map of the Province of New York in North America . . . by order of His Excellency Major General William Tryon . . ." (London: William Fadden, engraver)
"A Chorographical Map of the Province of New York in North America . . . by order of His Excellency Major General William Tryon . . ." (London: William Fadden, engraver)
This is an 1849 reprint of the original [1779], made at Albany by Richard H. Pease. Probably removed from "Documents Relating to the Colonial History of the State of New York" or similar work.
Offsite-Box: RC-6a, Folder: 1779 Map of New York State
